dev tools.name: Vs code
dev tools.information: Visual Studio Code is a popular code editor with extensive support for web development. It offers a wide range of extensions and features, making it highly customizable and suitable for various programming languages.

dev tools.name: Atom
dev tools.information: Atom is a flexible and hackable text editor with a large community of developers creating plugins to enhance its functionality. It provides an easy-to-use interface for web development and is well-suited for frontend and backend coding.

dev tools.name: Brackets
dev tools.information: Brackets is an open-source code editor that is specifically targeted at web development. It has features like live preview and inline editing, which make it convenient for working with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

dev tools.name: online html validator
dev tools.information: Online HTML validators are web-based tools that help check the validity of HTML code, ensuring it adheres to web standards. They can identify syntax errors and improve overall code quality.

dev tools.name: webstorm
dev tools.information: WebStorm is a powerful IDE designed for professional web development. It comes with intelligent code assistance, a built-in debugger, and integration with various frontend frameworks, making it suitable for large-scale projects.

dev tools.name: Bootstrap
dev tools.information: Bootstrap is a popular CSS framework that provides a collection of pre-designed CSS and JavaScript components. It helps developers quickly build responsive and visually appealing websites.

dev tools.name: Tailwind CSS
dev tools.information: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework that enables developers to quickly create custom designs without writing custom CSS. It's highly flexible and focuses on providing low-level utility classes.

dev tools.name: Materialize
dev tools.information: Materialize is a modern CSS framework based on Google's Material Design principles. It offers a set of CSS components and JavaScript plugins to create sleek and responsive user interfaces.

dev tools.name: Semantic UI
dev tools.information: Semantic UI is an intuitive CSS framework that focuses on human-friendly HTML. It provides a comprehensive set of UI components and is easy to integrate with various JavaScript frameworks.
